backend/main.mo: Actor exposing health info placeholders and delegating HTTP outcall transformations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence describing frontend polling hookup tasks with related files, components, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style list of frontend file descriptions used for documentation or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base with extensive CSS variables defining light/dark color themes and layout globals.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app composing presale sections, animated background, and background music controller.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundMusic/: Floating UI control for background music mute and volume using popover and slider.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer rendering copyright text and a caffeine.ai referral link.
frontend/src/components/presale/Contribu: Displays contributor data with sync indicators, stale data warnings, and IC Dashboard link.
frontend/src/components/presale/Countdow: 24‑hour countdown display using the countdown hook.
frontend/src/components/presale/DepositA: Shows presale ICP deposit address with copy button and IC Dashboard link.
frontend/src/components/presale/HeroSect: Displays the main presale hero section with an image, animated title, tagline, and three feature cards.
frontend/src/components/presale/HowToCon: Explains the steps to contribute to the presale and shows key presale details using constants.
frontend/src/components/presale/LatestTr: Shows the latest contributions with auto‑refresh indicators, sync status warnings, and fallback states.
frontend/src/components/presale/PostPres: Displays listing details after presale, with loading and active‑presale fallback states.
frontend/src/components/presale/PresaleP: Renders presale progress, warnings for sync issues, and live polling indicators using presale status.
frontend/src/components/presale/PresaleS: Wraps countdown, presale parameters, progress, deposit address, and transactions into a presale status section.
frontend/src/components/presale/Tokenomi: React component rendering tokenomics details and FAQ, using MAX_SUPPLY and styled layout cards.
frontend/src/constants/listingsAfterPres: Defines a ListingItem type and a list of planned post‑presale listings with titles, descriptions, and statuses.
frontend/src/constants/presale.ts: Exports presale constants including deposit address, caps, supply, polling intervals, and dashboard URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackgroundMusic.ts: Hook managing background audio playback, user preferences, autoplay blocking, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useContributors.ts: Hook polling backend for contributor data and sync health, currently returning placeholder contributions.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdown24h.ts: Provides a 24‑hour countdown timer with hours, minutes, and seconds remaining.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity provider and hook wrapping AuthClient to manage login, identity state, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/usePresaleStatus.ts: Hook polling presale stats and health, currently returning placeholder presale data with sync monitoring.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, and numerous custom neon and animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/backgroundMusicStorag: Handles loading, saving, and validating background‑music preferences and opt‑in state in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/contributors.ts: Aggregates contribution records by address and sorts them by most recent timestamp.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Formats numbers using German locale with fixed three‑decimal output.
frontend/src/utils/utcTimestamp.ts: Converts nanosecond timestamps into formatted UTC date strings.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Provides a Promise timeout wrapper and a custom TimeoutError class.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, custom colors from CSS variables, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Captures project status, requirements, architecture notes, and known issues for the presale website.
